name: Galaxies: Unnamed
description:
Fully playable multiplayer prototype made with Godot in 2 days

Comments are welcome!
Let me know what type of gameplay you'd like to see implemented:
- Tower Defense
- Battle Royale
- RTS

Features so far:
Multiplayer connection
PvP
PvE
Long Range Scanner for enemy detection
Bots getting more aggresive over time
Score Tracking
